name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-ai-driven-expense-report-processing
title: AI-Driven Expense Report Processing
shortDescription: This sample showcases an AI-driven expense report processing solution that combines an AI Builder prompt, Dataverse, and Power Automate.
longDescription: This sample showcases an AI-driven expense report processing solution that combines an AI Builder prompt, Dataverse, and Power Automate.

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.
